about_the_game:
The Story

Recently, you met Ellie who has since become your girlfriend. However, she doesn't seem to get along well with your circle of friends. After a bit of an incident in which Ellie insulted one of your long-time friends, things became very suspicious however. John, who you have known for years, suddenly doesn't answer his phone anymore.

Take control over Vic, the main character of this story and find out what is happening in your friends circle.

The Gameplay

The gameplay includes:
  • A choice-driven story
  • Multiple Endings
  • Instant-Messenger story telling
  • Stunning pixel art
  • Quite a few easter eggs to discover

Don't forget. Your choices matter. During the course of the story you will have several options to decide how to interact with your friends. Find out what is off.

content_descriptors.notes: Includes weapons, blood, kidnapping, torture and murder.

name: Hello, Vic

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 710 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Ellie, your new girlfriend, doesn't seem to get along well with your circle of friends. Find out what is going wrong after one of your best friends suddenly doesn't answer his phone anymore in this pixel-art, story-driven adventure.
